title: Start Me Up: How That Band Got That Name They Got
description: Did you know that Imagine Dragons is an anagram?Did you know that a-ha means the same thing in every language?In "Start Me Up" you will discover the meaning behind the names of over 500 bands.What's the story behind Strawberry Alarm Clock?Was there a real Lynyrd Skynyrd?Is Creedence Clearwater Revival really named after beer?Find out all this and much more!Filled with trivia, insights, and humor, "Start Me Up" will get you flipping back through your record collection. (Or looking up Animal Collective on iTunes.)
author: Morgan Locklear
